title: Establishes the crime of unlawful use of spyware and malware
summary: Establishes the crime of unlawful use of spyware and malware; unlawful use of spyware and malware is a class A misdemeanor, provided, however, that unlawful use of spyware and malware by a person who has been previously convicted within the last five years of having violated this section is a class E felony.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the crime of unlawful use of spyware and malware
